Package edu.handong.csee.java.lab07.prob3

Class Attendance

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.handong.csee.java.lab07.prob3.Attendance

  • public class Attendance
extends java.lang.Object
    Attendance class checks the attendance for each student.

    This class has various setter and getter methods for student id number, number of absence, name and grade of the student. It also has 2 constructors for empty and with parameters.

    Author:
    Jun Seob Lee

    • Constructor Detail

      • Attendance

        public Attendance​()
        Empty class constructor for Attendance class.

        This constructor initializes everything nothing or 0 since nothing is given or passed.

      • Attendance

        public Attendance​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String grade,
                  int student_id)
        Constructor with 3 parameters for Attendance class

        This constructor sets the values of name,grade,student id and initializes number of absence depending on the parameters passed.

        Parameters:
        name - string that contains the name of the student
        grade - string that stores the value of which year the student is studying in
        student_id - integer value that has the id number of the student

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is main method.

        This method creates various student objects and uses setter methods to set the information of each student. Also calls methods to assign random absence values and checks if the student has made enough attendance to pass the course.

        Parameters:
        args - string input that can be read from use while executing

      • getStudent_id

        public int getStudent_id​()
        Getter method for student_id.

        This method returns or basically gives the value of the student id that is currently stored in the particular object.

        Returns:
        the student id number of the student

      • setStudent_id

        public void setStudent_id​(int student_id)
        Setter method for student_id.

        This method sets the student id number as to what the parameter was passed.

        Parameters:
        student_id - integer value of student id number of the student object

      • getAbsence

        public int getAbsence​()
        Getter method for absence.

        This method returns or basically gives the value of the number of absence of the student that is currently stored in the particular object.

        Returns:
        the number of absences of the student

      • setRandomAbsence

        public void setRandomAbsence​()
        Setter method for random absence.

        This method sets the number of absence randomly by using Math.random() from 0 to 10.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName​()
        Getter method for name.

        This method returns or basically gives the name of the student that is currently stored in the particular object.

        Returns:
        the name of the student

      • getGrade

        Getter method for grade.

      • setGrade

        Setter method for grade.

        This method sets the grade of the student as to what the parameter was passed.

        Parameters:

      • isFail

        public boolean isFail​()
        This is the isFail() method.

        This method checks whether the number of absences that a particular student object has is a fail in the course or not.

        Returns:
        boolean value which is either true or false

      • checkAttendance

        public static void checkAttendance​(Attendance student)
        This is the checkAttendance() method.

        this method checks if the student has failed or not by calling the isFail() method and prints the information accordingly through the use of getter methods.

        Parameters:
        student - Attendance class object that is passed to actually call the current student's getter methods
